author: Ground News
title: Ground News - God speaks to people but we must tune in - www.elizabethton.com
text:
Summary by Ground News Rev. Billy Graham: A brand-new year is a wonderful time to say yes to Jesus Christ. Tune in to God through prayer and the study of Scripture, Graham says. The Bible says, Now is the accepted time (2 Corinthians 6:2, NKJV). Don't put it off. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
www.elizabethton.com God speaks to people but we must tune in - www.elizabethton.com From the writings of the Rev. Billy Graham Dear Rev. Graham: Every Jan. 1 I feel defeated and disconnected to God, who seems far off. How can I really turn over a new leaf? – N.L. Dear N.L.: In the early 20th century, radio was just coming of age. Families gathered around a box tuning dials in an effort to establish contact with the unseen transmitter. In time, a far distant sound would suddenly break through; a voice could be heard loud and cle…
